description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis- Let Go Of Your Emotional Conflicts And Blocks'. By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will-

  • Find out the reasons why people have emotional conflicts and mental/ emotional blocks
  • Learn how emotional conflicts and mental block gets programmed in your subconscious mind
  • Identify if you have emotional conflicts and mental blocks

Using Powerful Self Hypnosis Techniques And Practical Exercises .

Everyone faces negative emotional conflict in their mind due to Anger, Frustration , internal conflict , negative past and trauma which demotivates them cause hindrances in their path to success.

By taking this course you will be able to identify your strong emotions and use it for your advantage in achieving your goals

This course is in English and contains more than 35 minutes of video content designed over 13 lectures and practical exercises -

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Identify The Specific Areas Of Your Emotional Conflicts And Mental Blocks

Lecture7:Text File -1

Lecture8:Sit Back, Think, Analyze And Write Down Your Strongest Emotional Conflict(s)

Lecture9:Identify The Emotion Attached To Your Emotional Conflict And Blocks

Lecture10:Text File - 2

Lecture11:Create A New Mental Script For Your Emotional Conflict

Lecture12:Text File - 3

Lecture13: Summary
title: Hypnosis- Let Go Of Your Emotional Conflicts And Blocks
